table.caption: Cult Resources
rows: The cult uses a respectable guild, business, or institution as a front.
The cult thrives through the support of generations of a powerful noble family.
The cult controls the local officers of the law.
The cult has access to a cache of powerful magic.
The cult can open a direct portal to the Outer Planes, allowing fiends to intercede on their behalf.
The cult's leader is a renegade fiend seeking to evade its enemies.
table.name: Fiendish Cults; Cult Resources
